staxel.village.character.dialogue.LeifBe: Oh, it's just that she looks just like someone I used to know...
She's a bit too young to be her though.
Someday I'll work up the courage to ask her about it.
Even though she's not in the village.
I can't stop thinking about her.
There's just something I really want to ask her...
Someday I'll work up the courage to talk to you...
It helps me keep my thoughts in order.
You want to know more about ^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop;?
We grew up together - childhood friends if you would.
Things must be pretty serious if ^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop; came out here looking for me...
I feel bad for not being able to visit more often...
